msg: Add testrand program to exercise apr_generate_random_bytes

author: bnicholes
msg: Sorry, too many years of C++

author: trawick
msg: fix an IPv6 hole in apr_accept(); the bug prevented the proper
sockaddr from being returned in some cases

author: bnicholes
msg: Deferred the memory allocation for the new apr_socket_t until after the accept()
call so that we don't chew up huge chunks of memory when using non-blocking
sockets and also avoiding unnecessary memory allocations on error conditions.
